name: Hypnogogia
description:
In this small indie platformer a new world awaits. One that takes place within your own mind. You'll be led through terrifying locals, beautiful forests, and mystical caves. Adventure and fantasy await, can you overcome your flaws?

Hypnogogia has a 16 bit graphic style and includes various obstacles and challenges. (and a few easter eggs)

This is an early demo. It's been my own personal project for almost a year and I'm finally ready to show what I have. I'm looking for constructive feedback and I'd love to see what the community thinks. Please download and enjoy!

The more support I get the faster I'll complete this project so please let me know what you think. This is only a demo. This current build only works on windows.

The controls are

arrow keys to move

space bar to jump

P to pause

Esc to exit

1 to leave fullscreen

New version!

v.439

screen shake added

Slight graphical updates

Checkpoint sound loop fixed
